title: Troops patrol streets as calm returns to Sri Lanka, president's resignation awaited
content:
1. Troops patrol streets as calm returns to Sri Lanka, president's resignation awaited  Reuters.com
  2. Sri Lanka's President flees country as state of emergency declared - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Sri Lanka in crisis: Protesters storm prime minister's office | State of Emergency  6abc Philadelphia
  4. Sri Lanka's old political order has collapsed. What happens next? | Charu Lata Hogg  The Guardian
  5. Sri Lanka is in chaos and its President has fled. Here's what we know  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: スリランカに静けさが戻り、軍隊が街を巡回、大統領の辞任が待たれている。
斯里兰卡恢复平静，部队在街上巡逻，等待总统辞职
斯里蘭卡恢復平靜，部隊在街上巡邏，等待總統辭職
